# 𓌗 cord ⇔ Garn > yarn 𓎛 hernia

𓍱 | GN/GrN | garn 𓍱 ⋍ corn 𓌽
𓍲 | XrN=Rin(d) | 𓍲 CHrN churn ⋍ Corn / Grain 𓍱 γ

𓐩 𓏌 𓋳 | thread | garn ⇔ guard ?

𓐍 𓋴 𓍙 | spin (yarn) | ⋍kreis* / kräus* / Kh:g_ … Garn! ← / chasen / khres

𓎛 𓌳 𓄿 𓏏 𓎼 𓏥 𓈒 | carnelian, garnet | garnet (𓎛 wegen garn/qarn/corn/sérn) ⇔ carnelian +++ <<<

𓎛 𓅓 𓎼 𓎸 | carnelian ➙ garnet! |

𓈖 𓍇 𓏌 𓏲 𓏏 𓍢 𓏥 | yarn (for weaving) | ნართი narti +++ <> nähen, Naht, Netz νήμα níma snáth 𓈖 𓍇 𓏌 𓏲 𓐍 𓊮 | heat | nxehtësi 熱 ねつ netsu <> घृण ghṛṇa "warmth" Garn
